gameDetails.name: Imperial Settlers: Empires of the North â€“ Solo Scenarios
gameDetails.description:
2 extra solo scenarios: Frost Giants at the Wall & My Little Farm.

Was a pre-order bonus for those whom pre-ordered Imperial Settlers: Empires of the North at the webshop of Portal Games. It will be available later through the website of Portal Games. It was packaged by itself and separate from the base game.
